* Iron Raptor nods as she hears Prowl�s words, straining her arms, shoulders 
and legs to lift the Maximal warrior onto the steel slab which was the 
repair table.
Only the Matrix knew just how much time they had before Dinobot�s spark 
expired.
With a final heave she felt the weight lifted from her shoulders, meaning 
that the table was now supporting Dinobot and he was up upon it.
As carefully as she could while running against the clock, she lowered the 
warriors� torso until his back lay against the cold metal of the table. She 
then hooked a hand under his shoulder and pulled up as far as she could, 
trying to get as much of his body up on to the table.
With that done she sighed, but there was still no time to rest.
Iron Raptor looked Dinobot over very carefully, judging what to do next. 
Air! The first thing he needed was Air!
She snapped her head towards Prowl, a look on urgency on her face.*

� I need a large tube, about as thick as half your wrist and as long as your 
arm and torso combined. Quickly!!�

* She then snapped her attention back towards Dinobot, wondering just how 
she was going to get that tube into his lungs. But even as she thought so, 
her scanners alerted her of something very important�there was a rip in the 
wall of his lung. One that would let the air they pumped into his body if 
they didn�t do something about it.
But, how to get to that lung without having to cut him open?!
Iron Raptor closed her eyes and went through the possibilities they had, and 
one finally surfaced that was more likely then any others.
The wound in his chest, was deep and wide and led directly into his chest. 
If they widened the wound a bit then it would be open all the way to his 
lungs, where they could find the rip and repair it! Perfect!!
Iron Raptor looked over her shoulder to Prowl again.*

� I also need an energon blade and some welding material.�
